description: Try our easy to follow Mixed Fish Stew With Croutons recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Mixed Fish Stew With Croutons Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2.25kg mixed fish and shellfish, such as haddock, monkfish, plaice, and shelled uncooked prawns
4 cloves garlic, grated or finely chopped
1 handful fresh flat-leaf parsley, finely chopped (to garnish)

recipeInstructions.text: Wash the fish, then cut it into chunky bite-sized pieces and put to one side. Put the oil in a large wide pan, add the garlic, tomato purée, and onion, and cook over a very low heat for 5-8 minutes, or until the onion begins to soften.

Add the tomato, fennel seeds, saffron, and paprika, pour in the stock, and season with salt and black pepper. Bring to the boil, then reduce to a simmer and cook for 10 minutes. Add the fish and shellfish and simmer for a further 10 minutes, or until the fish is cooked.
Slice the bread on the diagonal and toast. Serve the soup with the toasted croutons, sprinkle over the cheese, and garnish with parsley.
